algorithm_technique: QuickSelect algorithm to find the k-th largest element, then reconstruct the subsequence.
problem_summary_simple: Find a subsequence of length k with the largest possible sum from a given array.
problem_summary_technical: Utilizes QuickSelect to find the k-th largest element, then filters the original array to include elements greater than or equal to this threshold, maintaining original order.
key_insights: QuickSelect provides an average O(n) solution for finding the k-th element.
The problem requires maintaining the relative order of elements, necessitating a second pass.
Handling duplicate values equal to the k-th largest element requires careful counting.
